sentences.sContent: The zebra finch is a tiny Australian songbird.
sentences.sContent_eng: The zebra finch is a tiny Australian songbird.
sentences.sCn: 斑胸草雀是一种来自澳洲的小型鸣禽。

sentences.sContent: Martinez sees the power of nature every day, from teaching neighbors to start gardens and songbird areas to leading inner-city kids on wilderness adventures.
sentences.sContent_eng: Martinez sees the power of nature every day, from teaching neighbors to start gardens and songbird areas to leading inner-city kids on wilderness adventures.
sentences.sCn: 马丁内斯每天都在见证自然的力量，从教导邻居开始开辟花园和鸣鸟区，到带领城市里的孩子们去野外大冒险。

synos.tran: 鸣禽，鸣鸟；女歌手；告密者

trans.tranOther: a bird that can make musical sounds
